r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - Fixed a bug in the task callbacks, the addtional data arg will now work as expected. - Added gearman_client_add_servers. This was adde in a recent version of libgearman. - Updates to zts for php 5.3 - Replaced errno with getErrno
